data.title: Westfield Middle School in Bloomingdale, IL, Homes For Sale
data.meta_description: Homes for sale, photos, sale history, and market trends for Westfield Middle School.
data.text:
Subdivisions/Buildings Median Price Aprina Estates

Aprina Estates is a single family home subdivision built in the mid 2010's. Aprina Estates is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois on Aprina Court west of Bloomingdale Road and north of Army Trail Road. Read more $515,000 Ashford Glen

Ashford Glen is a subdivision of duplex units built in the mid to late 2010s. Ashford Glen is located in Roselle, Illinois south of Lake Street and west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $400,000 August Mist

August Mist is a condominium complex built in 1980. August Mist is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Lake Street and east of Bloomingdale Road. $152,000 Baker Hill

Baker Hill is a townhome community built in the late 1990's and early 2010's by Town & Country Homes. Baker Hill is located in Glen Ellyn, Illinois off of Fairview Avenue north of Roosevelt Road. Baker Hill is close to tollway, shopping, parks and downtown Glen Ellyn. Read more $387,500 Bell Tower

Bell Tower is a condominium complex built in the late 1990s. Bell Tower is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Lake Street and west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $175,000 Bloomfield Club

Bloomfield Club is a subdivision of townhomes and single family homes built in the late 1980's and early 1990's by Hoffman Homes. Bloomfield Club features town homes with floor plans ranging from 1,338 to 1,766 square feet of living space. The single family homes have floor plans ranging from 1,776 to more than 3,000 square feet of living space. Bloomfield Club is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Schick Road and east of Gary Avenue. Read more $315,000 Bloomfield Hills

Bloomfield Hills is a single family home neighborhood built in the late 1980s by Hoffman Homes. Bloomfield Hills features homes with floor plans ranging from 1,802 to 2,812 square feet of living space. Bloomfield Hills is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois north of Schick Road and east of Gary Avenue. Read more $412,250 Bloomingdale Walk Townhomes

Bloomingdale Walk Townhomes is a townhome community built by Toll Brothers between 2006 & 2008. A newer section built by Pulte homes is to be completed in Spring of 2020. Bloomingdale Walk is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois at the southwest corner of Schick Road and Springfield Drive. Read more $401,500 Branigars

Branigars is a single family neighborhood located in Roselle, Illinois. Branigars is on Spring Hill and Foster, south of Roselle Road. $315,500 Branigars Lake Woods

Branigars Lake Woods is a single family home subdivision. Branigars Lake Woods is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois west of 2nd Street and north of Schick Road. $399,000 Casa Bella Estates

Casa Bella Estates is a townhome community built in the mid 2010s. Casa Bella is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Schick Road and west of Gary Avenue. Read more $462,500 Chateau Lorraine

Chateau Lorraine is a townhome community built in the early 1990s by Pulte Homes. Chateau Lorraine features 164 town houses with floor plans ranging from 1,526 to 2,258 square feet of living space. Chateau Lorraine is located north of Schick Road and west of Bloomingdale Road in Bloomingdale, Illinois. Read more $272,500 Chesapeake Landing

Chesapeake Landing is a single family neighborhood located in Roselle, Illinois. Chesapeake Landing is on West End Road and Central off of Roselle Road south of Irving Park Road. Read more $201,000 Country Club Estates

Country Club Estates is a townhouse community built in the 1980's. Country Club Estates features townhomes with floor plans ranging from 1500 to 3000 square feet of living space. Country Club Estates is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois north of Schick Road and west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $300,000 East Gate

Lakewoods is a single family home subdivision located in Bloomingdale, Illinois north of Schick Road and west of Bloomingdale Road. $339,500 Linnaea Gardens

Linnaea Gardens is a condo building built in 1968. Linnaea Gardens is located at 191 E. Hillcrest Terrace in Bloomingdale, Illinois. $145,500 Longridge

Longridge is a single family home neighborhood built in the mid 1980s. Longridge is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois west of Bloomingdale Road and south of Schick Road. $351,000 Los Lagos

Los Lagos is a community of custom built single family homes which were built in the early 2010s. Los Lagos is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois on the north side of Indian Lakes Resort which is south of Schick Road and west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $850,000 Medinah Country Estates

Medinah Country Estates is a single family home subdivision. Medinah Country Estates is located in Medinah, Illinois north of Broker Road and west of Medinah Road. $592,250 Medinah Grove

Medinah Grove is a subdivision of single family custom built homes. Medinah Grove is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois just east of Bloomingdale Golf Club and Glen Ellyn Road and south of Lake Street (Route 20). Read more $688,450 Medinah Meadows

Medinah Meadows is a subdivision of custom built single family homes. Medinah Meadows is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois north of Army Trail Road and east of Glen Ellyn Road. Read more $591,000 Medinah on the Lake

Medinah on the Lake is a condo community. The condos at 120 Lakeview Drive were built in the early to mid 1970's. Newer condo buildings built in 2006 by the Gammonley Group are located at 105 & 125 Lakeview. Medinah on the Lake features 208 condominiums with floor plans ranging from 1,067 to 1,662 square feet of living space. Medinah on the Lake is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois. Medinah on the Lake includes a fabulous clubhouse, pool, beach, tennis courts, pool, and sauna. Read more $203,000 Medinah Spring Hills

Medinah Spring Hills is a single family home neighborhood located in Roselle, Illinois. Medinah Spring Hills is on Bryn Mawr west of Foster and Medinah. $410,000 Medinah Terrace

Medinah Terrace is a single family home subdivision. Medinah Terrace is located in Medinah, Illinois south of Thorndale Avenue and east of Medinah Road. $570,000 Old Towne Estates

Old Towne Estates features homes with floor plans ranging from 1,830 to 2,900 square feet of living space. Old Towne Estates is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Schick Road and west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $440,000 On the Park

On the Park is a townhome community built in the mid 1990s. On the Park is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Lake Street and east of Springfield Drive. Read more $320,250 One Bloomingdale Place

One Bloomingdale Place features 170 condos with eight floor plans ranging from 772 to 1,257 square feet of living space. One Bloomingdale Place is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois at Scheck and Country Club Drive west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $145,000 Rose Garden

Rose Garden is a townhouse community located in Roselle, Illinois. Rose Garden is on Rosebud Court North of Garden and Lake Street. $280,000 Rosedale

Summerfield is a single family home neighborhood built by U.S. Shelter. Summerfield is located off of Borden Drive north of Mensching and Bryn Mawr Road in Roselle, Illinois. Read more $298,500 Suncrest Highlands

Villa Veneto is a townhome community built in 2004 by Realen Homes. Villa Veneto features 74 townhomes with floor plans ranging from 1,901 to 2,271 square feet of living space. Villa Veneto is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Lake Street and east of Gary Avenue. Read more $339,125 Villas Of Thornfield

Villas of Thornfield is a townhome community built in 2001 by Tantillo Homes. Villas of Thornfield features town homes with floor plans ranging from 2,020 to 2,430 square feet of living space. Villas of Thornfield is located in Bloomingdale, Illinois south of Lake Street and west of Bloomingdale Road. Read more $332,500 Westlake
